children.name: controlOut
children.description: Gets or sets the second curve control point of this segment.The setter returns the current Segment to allow chaining.

children.name: controlIn
children.description: Gets or sets the first curve control point of this segment.The setter returns the current Segment to allow chaining.

children.name: anchor
children.description: Gets or sets the segment anchor point.The setter returns the current Segment to allow chaining.
